statsAutres.cImmune: to blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned

features.description: You lie dormant until a creature moves within 30 ft. of you. You may then activate and use Spark Bolt. You remain active for up to 10 minutes.

features.name: Static Shock
features.description:
When you hit a creature with an attack, you can grant advantage to the next attack
roll made against that creature.

features.name: Spark Bolt
features.description: Ranged: +8 to hit, range 30 ft., two creatures. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) lightning damage.

features.name: Shocker
features.description: Ranged: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d12 + 2) lightning damage and the target is restrained until the end of its next turn.

features.name: Deactivate
features.description: An adjacent creature can spend an action to deactivate you using a set of thieves' tools (or other appropriate equipment). Check: DC 11 INT (Arcana). Success: You take 38 (5d12 + 6) force damage. If you are reduced to 0 hit points, you are safely deactivated.

features.name: Redirect
features.description: An adjacent creature can spend an action to redirect your next attack using a set of thieves' tools (or other appropriate equipment). Check: DC 11 INT (Arcana). Success: You must use Spark Bolt on your next turn and the creature may determine the target.

features.name: Destroy
features.description: If you are reduced to 0 hit points by a damaging attack, you explode. You deal 16 (2d12 + 3) lightning damage to each creature within 10 ft.
If you are safely deactivated, a creature can spend 10 minutes to retrieve a topaz core from your lightning charger. This requires a set of tinker's tools.
